contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Finnish Municipality |name = Kihniö |official_name = {{lang|fi|Kihniön kunta|nocat=true}} |native_name = |native_name_lang = |nickname = |settlement_type = Municipality |motto = |image_skyline =Kihniö kirkko 2012.JPG |imagesize = |image_caption = |image_flag = |flag_size = |image_seal = |seal_size = |image_shield = Kihniö.vaakuna.svg |shield_size = |image_blank_emblem = |blank_emblem_type = |blank_emblem_size = |image_map = Kihniö.sijainti.suomi.2008.svg |mapsize = |map_caption = Location of Kihniö in [[Finland]] |image_dot_map = |dot_mapsize = |dot_map_caption = |dot_x = |dot_y = |pushpin_map = <!-- name of a location map as per Template:Location_map --> |pushpin_label_position = <!-- position of the pushpin label: left, right, top, bottom, none --> |pushpin_map_caption = |pushpin_mapsize = |province = [[Western Finland]] |region = [[Pirkanmaa]] |subregion = North Western Pirkanmaa sub-region |leader_title = Municipal manager |leader_name = Petri Liukku |leader_title1 = |leader_name1 = |leader_title2 = |leader_name2 = |leader_title3 = |leader_name3 = |established_title = [[Charter]] |established_date = 1920 |established_title2 = |established_date2 = |established_title3 = |established_date3 = |extinct_title = |extinct_date = |area_urban_km2 = |area_metro_km2 = |population_metro = |population_blank1_title = |population_blank1 = |population_density_metro_km2 = |population_urban = |population_density_urban_km2 = |population_note = |finnish_official = 1 |swedish_official = |sami_official = |urbanisation = |unemployment = |blank1_name = |blank1_info = |blank2_name = |blank2_info = |coordinates_display = |coordinates_type = |latd=62 |latm= 12 |lats= 30 |latNS=N |longd=023 |longm= 10 |longs= 45 |longEW=E |elevation_m = |postal_code = |website = [http://www.kihnio.fi/ www.kihnio.fi] |footnotes = }} '''Kihniö''' is a [[municipalities of Finland|municipality]] of [[Finland]]. It is located in the [[regions of Finland|region]] of [[Pirkanmaa]], Western Finland. The municipality has a population of {{formatnum: {{Infobox Finnish Municipality/population count|Kihniö}}}} ({{#time: j F Y|{{Infobox Finnish Municipality/population count|sourcedate}} }})<ref name="population_count" /> and covers an area of {{convert|{{Infobox Finnish Municipality/total area|Kihniö}}|km2}} of which {{convert|{{Infobox Finnish Municipality/waters area|Kihniö}}|km2|abbr=on}} is water.<ref name="total_area" /> The [[population density]] is {{convert|{{Infobox Finnish Municipality/population density|Kihniö|round=2}}|PD/km2}}. The municipality is unilingually [[Finnish language|Finnish]]. ==Politics== Results of the [[Finnish parliamentary election, 2011]] in Kihniö: *[[True Finns]] 53.2% *[[Centre Party (Finland)|Centre Party]] 15.5% *[[Christian Democrats (Finland)|Christian Democrats]] 14.4% *[[National Coalition Party]] 6.5% *[[Social Democratic Party of Finland|Social Democratic Party]] 5.9% *[[Communist Party of Finland (1997)|Communist Party of Finland]] 2.3% *[[Green League]] 1.1% *[[Left Alliance (Finland)|Left Alliance]] 0.5% *[[Pirate Party (Finland)|Pirate Party]] 0.5% ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== {{Commonscat-inline}} *[http://www.kihnio.fi/ Municipality of Kihniö] – Official website {{Pirkanmaa}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Kihnio}} [[Category:Municipalities of Pirkanmaa Region]] [[Category:Populated places established in 1920]] {{WesternFinland-geo-stub}}
